column2: Polygon motor does not synchronize with the reference clock.
Heater thermistor harness disconnected or broken.
In-casing temperature sensor harness disconnected or broken.
Main motor does not synchronize with the reference clock.
ASIC error on the main PCB.
Paper jam. The registration sensor, 2nd registration sensor, and/or manual insertion sensor remains ON.
Paper jam. The paper ejection sensor remains ON.
Paper jam. Even after the registration sensor has gone OFF, the paper ejection sensor still stays OFF.
Document not detected by the document rear sensor.
50% or more faulty of white level data.
Less than 50% faulty of white level data.
The CCD HP sensor sticks to OFF, indicating that the CCD unit has not returned to the home position.
The CCD HP sensor sticks to ON, indicating that the CCD unit has stayed in the home position.
Scan area left edge detection error.
Scan area right edge detection error.
A/D converter reference voltage error (at High level).
A/D converter reference voltage error (at Low level).
Magnification error for substantial white level data.
Substantial white level data error in black & white mode.
Substantial white level data error in photo mode.
Detection error of ADF scanning position.
The MODEM fails to complete the command transmission sequence.
EOL not found in page memory transmission mode.
